schedule.title: Schedule
schedule.description: The cron schedule to execute this job on.

end_time.title: End Time
end_time.description: The end date to stop running the cron.

assistant_id.description: The assistant ID or graph name to run. If using graph name, will default to the assistant automatically created from that graph by the server.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Metadata to assign to the cron job runs.

context.title: Context
context.description: Static context added to the assistant.

webhook.title: Webhook
webhook.description: Webhook to call after LangGraph API call is done.

interrupt_before.title: Interrupt Before
interrupt_before.description: Nodes to interrupt immediately before they get executed.

interrupt_after.title: Interrupt After
interrupt_after.description: Nodes to interrupt immediately after they get executed.

multitask_strategy.title: Multitask Strategy
multitask_strategy.description: Multitask strategy to use. Must be one of 'reject', 'interrupt', 'rollback', or 'enqueue'.

title: CronCreate
description: Payload for creating a cron job.
